coreAttributes.name: Nutrient Paste
coreAttributes.description: A small metal container filled with a rather unappetizing paste of some sort. The scent can be detected through the tin, and is quite strong, almost unappetizing...
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a little bit excited down south.

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 5)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_LUST, 5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Peeling the top on the tin can, [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] a whiff of the ration-like paste. The stuff looks like a cracker spread at first glance, but closer inspection shows it to have many lumps. [npc.name] can't help but experimentally dip a finger down into the stuff, bringing it back to taste. It is potent, and [npc.her] [npc.tongue+] alights with so many conflicting flavors at once. [npc.name] #IF(npc.getFaceType()==FACE_TYPE_Aurelia_Sergal_face) [npc.verb(start)] using [npc.her] tongue to lap up the remnants of the paste, and in a matter of moments [npc.has] completely cleaned out the tin. #ELSE [npc.verb(lap)] the paste, the delicious taste bringing out an immense wave of pleasure. [npc.her] eyes half-close, and in a matter of moments [npc.has] finished the stuff off. #ENDIF
